entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Another -2146232797, courtesy of new() #72448
    17.10
  • Async iterators permit yield return inside of lock blocks #72443
    17.11
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild contains in code path to non existent folder in nuget package #72441
  • Exception during execution of AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH terminates test process #72437
  • shift enter does not work for c# comments #72436
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling optional generic partial methods (no modifier) #72431

Closed

  • Analyzer warning when using default value expression for structs that contain reference types which are not nullable #72415
  • Access to primary constructor parameter fails with CS1061 #72411

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused diagnostic methods #72445
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move Linux to building Roslyn.sln #72438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow the new `lock` in `async` methods #72435
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Allow testing official builds on any branch #72433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cap signing file size to avoid OOMs #72432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use ProvideSettingsManifest to specify Unfied Settings registration file #72429
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove code for arbitrary diagnostic taggers #72409
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only use absolute URIs for TextDocumentLocation #72442
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused error-list types #72440
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Squeeze down the size of the skeleton reference cache. #72403
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove flags controlling diagnostic mode. #62735
    Area-IDE, Next
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #72305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce thread contention on ProjectSystemProject._gate #72424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix log contention issue #72419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup OptProf profiling for LanguageServer.Protocol #72404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce closure allocations associated with AsyncLazy usage #72449
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove portions of solution crawler #72147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use the List(int) constructor if possible when lowering collection expressions #72427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP (try2): Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Standardize our Powershell code #72423
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Use AsyncBatchingWorkQueue instead of TaskQueue #72425
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • WIP: Lazy work #72368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
